interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Line Sisters
Review Date: 2022/10/22
Categories: Suspense, Comedy, Horror, Drama
Product Description: ['Four sorority sisters reunite at a Black Greek Weekend celebration held on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. Having pledged the Alpha Beta Omega Sorority, Inc., they share more than the bonds of sisterhood, after the mysterious death of the dean of pledges 15 years prior. But the past comes knocking on their door as they arrive to the island.']
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Big Dreams Entertainment', 'LLC'], 'Producers': ['David Eubanks', 'Leslie Greif', 'Regina McLeod', 'Tiayoka McMillan', "D'Angela Proctor", 'Kelly R. Tenney', 'Eric Tomosunas']}
Review Text: The movie was corny but I still watched it lol
